Method.name: CheckAdmDate
Method.Implementation: Set AdmDate=$P($g(^PAADM(Adm)),"^",6) If (AdmDate<DateFrom)!(AdmDate>DateTo) Quit 1 Quit 0

Method.name: FindDocCurrentAdmClose
Method.Implementation: Set repid=$LIST(qHandle,2) Kill ^CacheTemp(repid) Quit $$$OK

Method.name: FindDocCurrentAdmExecute
Method.Implementation:
Set UserID=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") w %session.Get("LOGON.GROUPDESC") Set CurDate=+$H
I StartDate'="" S StartDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(StartDate) I EndDate'="" S EndDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(EndDate)
s SurName=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPECommon).UnEscape(SurName) d ..DeleteTempQuery()
if (PatientNo="")&&(SurName="")&&(StartDate="")&&(EndDate="")&&(IncludeCompleted="")&&(IsCanSumResult="")&&(IsCanSumResult="")&&(GroupID="")&&(TeamID="")&&(LocAudited="") { s PatientNo=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"PatientNo")) s SurName=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"SurName")) s StartDate=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"StartDate")) s EndDate=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"EndDate")) s IncludeCompleted=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"IncludeCompleted")) s IsCanSumResult=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"IsCanSumResult")) s GroupID=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"GroupID")) s TeamID=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"TeamID")) s DocName=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"DocName")) s LocAudited=$g(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"LocAudited")) s MainDoctor=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"MainDoctor")) } else { s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"PatientNo")=PatientNo s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"SurName")=SurName s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"StartDate")=StartDate s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"EndDate")=EndDate s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"IncludeCompleted")=IncludeCompleted s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"IsCanSumResult")=IsCanSumResult s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"GroupID")=GroupID s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"TeamID")=TeamID s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"LocAudited")=LocAudited s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"DocName")=DocName s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"MainDoctor")=MainDoctor } s SurName=$ZCVT(SurName,"U") Set LocID=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") i HPLocID'="" s LocID=HPLocID //Set LocID=1171
//如果是已完成，日期条件为空，默认为一周内的 i (IncludeCompleted'="")&&(StartDate="")&&(EndDate="")&&($g(PatientNo)="") d .s EndDate=+$h .s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"StartDate")=StartDate .s ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",CurDate,UserID,"EndDate")=EndDate
If LocID="" Set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) Quit $$$OK If UserID="" Set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) Quit $$$OK
If (PatientNo="")&&(SurName="")&&(StartDate="")&&(EndDate="")&&(IncludeCompleted="")&&(IsCanSumResult="")&&(GroupID="")&&(LocAudited="") d .Set StartDate=+$h ;Set StartDate=+$h Set CurrentAdmType="H" Set CurrentDept=LocID
Set Count=0 Set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) If $g(ind)="" Set ind=1
Set Singleflag=0 set StatusList=",ARRIVED,CHARGED," if IncludeCompleted'="" set StatusList=StatusList_"COMPLETED," i PatientNo'="" s PatientNo=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPECommon).RegNoMask(PatientNo)
Set PatientNo=$tr(PatientNo," ","")
///ReWrite by wrz 080314 If ($g(PatientNo)'="") Do .s PAPMI=$O(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",PatientNo,"")) .q:$g(PAPMI)="" .d OutPAPMI else if ($g(GroupID)'="")&&(GroupID'="ALLG")&&(GroupID'="ALLI") d .s TeamDR=0 .f s TeamDR=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"GADM",GroupID,TeamDR)) q:TeamDR="" d ..q:(TeamID'="")&&(TeamID'=TeamDR) ..s PEIADM=0 ..f s PEIADM=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"GADM",GroupID,TeamDR,PEIADM)) q:PEIADM="" d ...s PAAdm=$p($G(^DHCPEIADM(PEIADM)),"^",1) ...q:PAAdm="" ...d CheckPAADM else if ($g(SurName)'="") d .s desc=$o(^DHCPEPreIBI(0,"Name",SurName),-1) .f s desc=$o(^DHCPEPreIBI(0,"Name",desc)) q:(desc="")||(desc'[SurName) d ..s IBI=0 ..f s IBI=$o(^DHCPEPreIBI(0,"Name",desc,IBI)) q:IBI="" d ...s PreIADM=0 ...f s PreIADM=$o(^DHCPEPreIADM(0,"PIBI",IBI,PreIADM)) q:PreIADM="" d ....s PEIADM=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"CRMADM",PreIADM,0)) ....q:PEIADM="" ....s PAAdm=$p($G(^DHCPEIADM(PEIADM)),"^",1) ....q:PAAdm="" ....d CheckPAADM else d .d SetDefaultDate .d DeptPatList w (ind-1)_"人",! Set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) Quit $$$OK
OutPAPMI If CurrentAdmType'="" Do .Set PAAdm="" .For Set PAAdm=$O(^PAPERdr(PAPMI,"ADM",CurrentAdmType,PAAdm),-1) Quit:(PAAdm="")||(PAAdm=0) Do // modify by zhouli ..d CheckPAADM Else Do .Set AdmType="" .For Set AdmType=$O(^PAPERdr(PAPMI,"ADM",AdmType)) Quit:AdmType="" Do ..Set PAAdm="" ..For Set PAAdm=$O(^PAPERdr(PAPMI,"ADM",AdmType,PAAdm)) Quit:PAAdm="" Do ...d CheckPAADM q
CheckPAADM Set DeptId=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",4) Quit:LocID'=DeptId d SetDefaultDate Quit:(..CheckAdmDate(PAAdm,StartDate,EndDate))&&(PatientNo="")&&(GroupID="") Set EIIsLoc=..EpisodeIdLoc(UserID,PAAdm) Quit:EIIsLoc=0 d OutputRow q
DeptPatList s DeptItem=CurrentDept Quit:DeptItem="" if EndDate'="" set Date=EndDate+1 else set Date="" i StartDate="" s StartDate=0 For Set Date=$O(^PAADMi("CurrLoc",DeptItem,Date),-1) Quit:(Date="")!(Date<StartDate) Do .Set Time="" .For Set Time=$O(^PAADMi("CurrLoc",DeptItem,Date,Time)) Quit:(Time="") Do ..Set PAAdm="" ..For Set PAAdm=$O(^PAADMi("CurrLoc",DeptItem,Date,Time,PAAdm)) Quit:(PAAdm="") Do ...d CheckPAADM Quit
SetDefaultDate if StartDate="" Set StartDate=+$h-40 //StartDate=$ZDH("2005-11-28",3) If EndDate="" Set EndDate=+$H Quit
OutputRow Do ResetVariables Set PatientID=$P(^PAADM(PAAdm),"^",1) ///医生根据登记号查询时登记状态自动到达 Set PEAdm=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"PAADM",PAAdm,"")) q:PEAdm="" s PreIADM=$P($g(^DHCPEIADM(PEAdm)),"^",4) q:PreIADM="" s LocFlag=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetLocFlag("PreADM",PreIADM) //Add by 090702 q:LocFlag=1
i PatientNo'="" d .//第一个为医生界面自动到达\第二个为打印条码自动到达 .s AutoArrived=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","AutoArrived",%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID"))) .s AutoArrived=$p(AutoArrived,"^",1) .i AutoArrived="Y" d ..d ##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEIAdm).IAdmArrived(PreIADM)
q:##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).IsArrivedStatu(PAAdm)="0" Set EpisodeID=PAAdm Set mradm=$P(^PAADM(PAAdm),"^",61) Set PAPMINO=$P(^PAPER(PatientID,"PAT",1),"^",1) q:$g(^PAPER(PatientID,"ALL"))="" Set PAPMIName=$P($g(^PAPER(PatientID,"ALL")),"^",1) q:(($ZCVT(PAPMIName,"U"))'[SurName)
Set PAPMIDOB=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml($P($g(^PAPER(PatientID,"ALL")),"^",6)) Set Sex=$P($g(^PAPER(PatientID,"ALL")),"^",7) Set PAPMISex=$P($g(^CT("SEX",Sex)),"^",2) Set PAAdmDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml($P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",6)) s Age=##class(web.DHCBillInterface).GetPapmiAge(PatientID,PAAdm) ;s Age=##class(web.DHCLCNUREXCUTE).CalAge($P($G(^PAPER(PatientID,"ALL")),"^",6),$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",6)) ;s Age=$P(Age,"Y",1) S PAPMISex="("_Age_")"_PAPMISex //过滤2007-07-12前的数据 2007-07-25 s PESystemStartDate=##class(web.DHCPE.Public.Setting).GetPESystemStartDate() q:$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",6)<PESystemStartDate /*/过滤2007-07-12前的数据 2007-07-25 q:$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",6)<60823 */ Set PAAdmTime=$ZT($P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",7),3)
// //Add Date Check // Set PAAdmNo=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",81) Set Loc=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",4) Set PAAdmDepCodeDR=$P($g(^CTLOC(Loc)),"^",2) Set Doctor=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",9) If Doctor'="" Set PAAdmDocCodeDR=$P($g(^CTPCP(Doctor,1)),"^",2) Else Set PAAdmDocCodeDR="" Set PAAdmType=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",2) Set Hosp=$P($g(^CTLOC(Loc)),"^",22) If Hosp'="" Set Hospital=$P($g(^CT("HOSP",Hosp)),"^",2) Set WardDr=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",70) if WardDr'="" Set PAAdmWard=$P($g(^PAWARD(WardDr)),"^",2) else Set PAAdmWard="" Set BedId=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",73) if BedId'="" Set PAAdmBed=$P($g(^PAWARD(+BedId,"BED",$P(BedId,"||",2))),"^",1) else Set PAAdmBed=""
Set FinancialDischargeFlag=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",45) Set MedicalDischargeFlag=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",63) Set PAAdmStatus=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",20) Set FinalDischargeFlag=$S($g(PAAdmStatus)="D":"Y",1:"N") Set AdmReason=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm,1)),"^",7) If AdmReason'="" Set PAAdmReason=$P($g(^PAC("ADMREA",AdmReason)),"^",2),PAAdmReasonCode=$P($g(^PAC("ADMREA",AdmReason)),"^",5) Else Set PAAdmReason="",PAAdmReasonCode="" Set DischargeDate=$P($g(^PAADM(PAAdm)),"^",17) If mradm'="" Set Diagnosis=..GetMRAdmDiagnosis(mradm) Else Set Diagnosis=""
//打开医生界面自动回传结果 //d ##class(web.DHCPE.TransResult).TransMain(PAAdm) s Reason="" s AppFlag=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).ItemHadApp("",PAAdm) q:(+AppFlag'=1)&&(IsCanSumResult'="")&&(IncludeCompleted="") i +AppFlag=2 s Reason=$p(AppFlag,"^",2)_"未出报告" s NoSub="" s Flag=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultDiagnosis).StationSHadSubmit(PAAdm) q:(Flag'=0)&&(IsCanSumResult'="") i Flag'=0 { s NoReason=$p(Flag,"^",2) s i=$L(NoReason,",") s AppReason=","_$p(AppFlag,"^",2)_"," for j=1:1:i { s NoItem=$p(NoReason,",",j) i AppReason'[(","_NoItem_",") { i NoSub="" { s NoSub=NoItem } else { s NoSub=NoSub_","_NoItem } } } } i Reason'="" { i NoSub'="" s Reason=Reason_";"_NoSub_"未提交" } else { i NoSub'="" s Reason=NoSub_"未提交" e s Reason="" } s RefuseReturn=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultDiagnosis).RefuseStations(PAAdm) i RefuseReturn'="" s Reason=Reason_";"_RefuseReturn_"谢绝检查" i IncludeCompleted="" { i MainDoctor="" { q:1=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GeneralAdviceAudited(PEAdm,"")
} } else { q:0=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GeneralAdviceAudited(PEAdm,"") q:$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEGeneralSummarize","MainDoctor",PAAdm))'="" } i MainDoctor'="" { q:(0=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GeneralAdviceAudited(PEAdm,""))
q:$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEGeneralSummarize","MainDoctor",PAAdm))="" } //q:(IncludeCompleted="")&&(1=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GeneralAdviceAudited(PEAdm,"")) //q:(IncludeCompleted'="")&&(0=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GeneralAdviceAudited(PEAdm,"")) Quit:PEAdm="" Set PEAdmStatus=$p(^DHCPEIADM(PEAdm),"^",8) Quit:(PatientNo)&&(StatusList'[PEAdmStatus)
s AdmLocAudit=..ADMLocIsAudit(PEAdm)
q:AdmLocAudit=2 Quit:(LocAudited="")&&(1=AdmLocAudit) //Add by MLH 2008-03-07
Quit:(LocAudited'="")&&(0=AdmLocAudit)
Set GAdmDr=$P($g(^DHCPEIADM(PEAdm)),"^",2) q:(GroupID="ALLI")&&(GAdmDr'="") q:(GroupID="ALLG")&&(GAdmDr="") q:((GroupID'="")&&(GroupID'="ALLI")&&(GroupID'="ALLG")&&(GroupID'=GAdmDr)) //q:(GroupID'="")&&(GroupID'=GAdmDr) Set TAdmDr=$P($g(^DHCPEIADM(PEAdm)),"^",3) q:(TeamID'="")&&(TeamID'=TAdmDr) ;s PreIADM=$P($g(^DHCPEIADM(PEAdm)),"^",4)
s PreIBaseInfo=$P($g(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM)),"^",1) q:PreIBaseInfo="" s TPosition=$P($g(^DHCPEPreIBI(PreIBaseInfo)),"^",12) s TIDCard=$P($g(^DHCPEPreIBI(PreIBaseInfo)),"^",9) s TPart="" //add by zhouli s TPart=$G(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIADM","Department",PreIADM)) q:(DepName'="")&&(DepName'=TPart) //add by zhouli s TType=$P($g(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreIADM)),"^",25) s TType=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetPreTypeDesc(TType) s TReCheck=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetReCheckFlag(PreIADM,"PreADM") s TReCheck=TReCheck+1 s TReCheck="第"_TReCheck_"次" Set Group="" Set GroupDr="" Set Team="" If GAdmDr'="" Do .Set GroupDr=$P($g(^DHCPEGADM(GAdmDr)),"^",1) .If $g(GroupDr)'="" Set Group=$P($g(^DHCPEGBI(GroupDr)),"^",2) .If $G(TAdmDr)'="" Set Team=$P($g(^DHCPEGADM(+TAdmDr,"Team",$P(TAdmDr,"||",2))),"^",1) s ^lisatest("0421","9")=1 Set RegDoctor="" Set ArrivedDate=PAAdmDate set ArrivedTime=PAAdmTime Set LeavedDate="" Set LeavedTime="" Set LocSeqNo="" Set PAAdmPriority="" Set ConsultRoom="" Set ConsultArea="" Set WalkStatus="" Set StatusCode="XX" Set PriorityCode="XX" Set SeqNo="999"
s PAAdmDocCodeDR=..GetGeneralDoctorName(PAAdm) q:(PAAdmDocCodeDR'="")&&(PAAdmDocCodeDR'=DocName)&&(DocName'="") // Set Count=Count+1
s TCheckingDoc=$G(^TempDHCPEDocPatientChecking(EpisodeID)) s:TCheckingDoc'="" TCheckingDoc=$P($G(^SSU("SSUSR",TCheckingDoc)),"^",1)
Set Seq=PAAdmBed If Seq="" Set Seq="ZZZZZ" set Data=$LB(PatientID,EpisodeID,mradm,PAPMINO,PAPMIName,PAPMIDOB,PAPMISex,PAAdmDate,PAAdmTime,PAAdmNo,PAAdmDepCodeDR,PAAdmDocCodeDR,PAAdmType,FinancialDischargeFlag,MedicalDischargeFlag,FinalDischargeFlag,PAAdmReason,DischargeDate,RegDoctor,Diagnosis,ArrivedDate,ArrivedTime,LeavedDate,LeavedTime,LocSeqNo,PAAdmPriority,WalkStatus,ConsultRoom,ConsultArea,PAAdmReasonCode,Group,Team,Reason,Count,$G(TPosition),TType,TReCheck,TIDCard,TCheckingDoc,TPart) Set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data Set ind=ind+1 Quit ResetVariables ///Set (repid)=0 //Set ($g(PatientID),$g(EpisodeID),$g(mradm),$g(PAPMINO),$g(PAPMIName),$g(PAPMIDOB),$g(PAPMISex),$g(PAAdmDate),$g(PAAdmTime),$g(PAAdmNo),$g(PAAdmDepCodeDR),$g(PAAdmDocCodeDR),$g(PAAdmType),$g(Hospital),$g(PAAdmWard),PAAdmBed,FinancialDischargeFlag,MedicalDischargeFlag,FinalDischargeFlag,PAAdmReason,DischargeDate,Diagnosis,RegDoctor,ArrivedDate,ArrivedTime,LeavedDate,LeavedTime,LocSeqNo,PAAdmPriority,WalkStatus,ConsultRoom,ConsultArea,PAAdmReasonCode,Group,Team,Reason,Count,TPosition,TType,TReCheck)="" Set (PatientID,EpisodeID,mradm,PAPMINO,PAPMIName,PAPMIDOB,PAPMISex,PAAdmDate,PAAdmTime,PAAdmNo,PAAdmDepCodeDR,PAAdmDocCodeDR,PAAdmType,Hospital,PAAdmWard,PAAdmBed,FinancialDischargeFlag,MedicalDischargeFlag,FinalDischargeFlag,PAAdmReason,DischargeDate,Diagnosis,RegDoctor,ArrivedDate,ArrivedTime,LeavedDate,LeavedTime,LocSeqNo,PAAdmPriority,WalkStatus,ConsultRoom,ConsultArea,PAAdmReasonCode,Group,Team,Reason,Count,TPosition,TType,TReCheck,TIDCard,TCheckingDoc)="" Quit

Method.name: FindDocCurrentAdmFetch
GetMRAdmDiagnosis
Method.Implementation: Quit:$g(MRAdm)="" "" Set DiagStr="" Set Diag=0 For Set Diag=$O(^MR(MRAdm,"DIA",Diag)) Quit:Diag="" Do .Set DiagID=$P($g(^MR(MRAdm,"DIA",Diag)),"^",1) .Quit:$g(DiagID)="" .Set DiagDesc=$P($g(^MRC("ID",DiagID)),"^",2) .If DiagDesc["-" Set DiagDesc=$P(DiagDesc,"_",2) .If DiagStr="" Set DiagStr=DiagDesc .Else Set DiagStr=DiagStr_","_DiagDesc Quit DiagStr

Method.name: GetDocRowIdByCode
Method.Implementation: Set val=$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(val) Set DocRowId=$O(^CTPCP(0,"Decs",val,"")) If DocRowId'="" Set DocCode=$P($g(^CTLOC(DocRowId)),"^",1) Quit DocRowId_"^"_$g(DocCode)_"^"_val

Method.name: GetIPAndName
Method.Implementation: Set IPAddress=$ZUTIL(67,15,$JOB) Set CompName=$ZUTIL(67,12,$JOB) Quit IPAddress_" "_CompName

Method.name: GetLocRowIdByCode
Method.Implementation: Set val=$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(val) Set LocRowId=$O(^CTLOC(0,"Code",val,"")) If LocRowId'="" Set LocDesc=$P($g(^CTLOC(LocRowId)),"^",2) Quit LocRowId_"^"_val_"^"_$g(LocDesc)

Method.name: GetLocRowIdByDesc
Method.Implementation: Set val=$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(val) Set LocRowId=$O(^CTLOC(0,"Desc",val,"")) If LocRowId'="" Set LocDesc=$P($g(^CTLOC(LocRowId)),"^",2) Quit LocRowId_"^"_val_"^"_$g(LocDesc)

Method.name: GetWardRowIdByCode
Method.Implementation: Set val=$$ALPHAUP^SSUTIL4(val) Set WardRowId=$O(^PAWARD(0,"WARD_Desc",val,"")) If WardRowId'="" Do .Set WardCode=$P($g(^PAWARD(WardRowId)),"^",1) .Set WardDesc=$P($g(^PAWARD(WardRowId)),"^",2) Quit WardRowId_"^"_$g(WardCode)_"^"_$g(WardDesc)

Method.name: GetWorkflowID
Method.Implementation: Quit ##Class(websys.WorkFlow).GetIdFromCodeOrDescription(Workflow)

UDLText.name: T

Method.name: EpisodeIdLoc
Method.Implementation: Set EpIsLoc=0 //0-没有 1-有 Set Group=%session.Get("LOGON.GROUPID") s LocID=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") If Group="" Set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) Quit $$$OK s chartID="" f s chartID=$O(^DHCPEDataEx("ChartAssign",UserID,LocID,Group,"Write",chartID)) q:(chartID="")||(EpIsLoc=1) d .s StationDr=chartID .s:StationDr="NULL" EpIsLoc=1 .q:EpIsLoc=1 ..Set OEOrder=0 ..For Set OEOrder=$O(^OEORD(0,"Adm",EpisodeID,OEOrder)) Quit:(OEOrder=""||EpIsLoc=1) Do ...s OEOrdItem=0 ...For Set OEOrdItem=$O(^OEORD(OEOrder,"I",OEOrdItem)) Quit:OEOrdItem="" Do ....Set OEORIRowId=OEOrder_"||"_OEOrdItem ....Set CEID=..CheckEpisodeID(EpisodeID,OEORIRowId,StationDr) ....If CEID=1 Set EpIsLoc=1 Quit EpIsLoc

Method.name: CheckEpisodeID
Method.Implementation:
Quit:$g(EpisodeID)="" 1 Quit:$g(OEORIRowId)="" 1 s Ord=$p(OEORIRowId,"||",1) s OrdItem=$p(OEORIRowId,"||",2)
s PEIAdmId=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"PAADM",EpisodeID,"")) q:PEIAdmId="" 1 s ItemStat=$P($g(^OEORD(Ord,"I",OrdItem,1)),"^",13) q:((ItemStat'=1)&(ItemStat'=6)) 0 s ArcimID=$P($g(^OEORD(Ord,"I",OrdItem,1)),"^",2) Set STORDChd=0, flag=0 For Set STORDChd=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ArcimID,StationDr,STORDChd)) Quit:(STORDChd=""||flag=1) Do .If STORDChd'="" Set flag=1 q flag

Method.name: GetGeneralDoctorName
Method.Implementation:
q "demo" s HospitalCode=$G(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","HospitalCode")) If HospitalCode="YY" { s DoctorName="" i PAADM="" q DoctorName s PEADM=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"PAADM",PAADM,"")) i PEADM="" q DoctorName s PreADM=$p(^DHCPEIADM(PEADM),"^",4) i PreADM="" q DoctorName s ARCIMDRs="2832||1" //s ARCIMDR="" s k=1 s j=$l(ARCIMDRs,"^") for k=1:1:j { s ARCIMDR=$p(ARCIMDRs,"^",k) s IItemSub=0 s i=0 f s IItemSub=$O(^DHCPEPreIADM(0,"ItmMast",ARCIMDR,PreADM,IItemSub)) q:IItemSub="" d .s Status=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PreADM,"ORDITEM",IItemSub),"^",16) .q:Status'="1" .s IItemID=PreADM_"||"_IItemSub
.s CRMID=$o(^DHCPECRMO(0,"CRMORI",IItemID,0)) .q:CRMID="" .s OEORIDR=$p(^DHCPECRMO(CRMID),"^",1) .q:OEORIDR="" . .s RLID=$o(^DHCPERLT(0,"ADMOD",PAADM,OEORIDR,0)) .q:RLID="" .s RLID=$o(^DHCPERLT(0,"ADMOD",PAADM,OEORIDR,RLID,0)) .q:RLID="" .s DocID=$p($G(^DHCPERLT(RLID)),"^",5) .q:DocID="" .i DoctorName="" d ..s DoctorName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",DocID),"^",1) .e d ..s DoctorName=DoctorName_","_$p(^SSU("SSUSR",DocID),"^",1) } } else { Set IADM=$O(^DHCPEIADM(0,"PAADM",PAADM,"")) Quit:$g(IADM)="" Set DoctorName="" Set GSRowId=$o(^DHCPEGS(0,"IADM",IADM,"")) If GSRowId'="" Do .Set AuditUserDR=$P($g(^DHCPEGS(GSRowId,1)),"^",5) .Quit:$g(AuditUserDR)="" .Set DoctorName=$p(^SSU("SSUSR",AuditUserDR),"^",2) } Quit $g(DoctorName)

Method.name: ADMLocIsAudit
Method.Implementation: Set LocIsAudit=0 //0-没有 1-有 2-没有操作此人的权限 Set Count=0 Set STNoSubmitStr=$g(^DHCPESetting("DHCPE","StationId_NoSubmit")) Set Group=%session.Get("LOGON.GROUPID") Set GroupDesc=%session.Get("LOGON.GROUPDESC") If GroupDesc="体检总检医生" q LocIsAudit If GroupDesc="体检复检医生" q LocIsAudit s PIADMDR=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADMDR),"^",4) i Group="" s qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) Quit $$$OK s curUser=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") s curLoc=%session.Get("LOGON.CTLOCID") s EpisodeID=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADMDR),"^",1) s ChartId=0 f s ChartId=$O(^DHCPEDataEx("ChartAssign",curUser,curLoc,Group,"Detail",ChartId)) q:ChartId="" d .q:$G(^DHCPEDataEx("ChartAssign",curUser,curLoc,Group,"Detail",ChartId))=0 .q:##class(web.DHCPE.Public.Setting).ShowChartPage(EpisodeID,ChartId)="0" .s RefuseFlag=..GetLocRefuseFlag(EpisodeID,ChartId) .q:RefuseFlag="0" .s Count=Count+1 .s StationDr=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GetPEStation($g(ChartId)) .q:StationDr="" .s STNoSubmit=0 .s SSRowId=$o(^DHCPESS(0,"IADM",IADMDR,StationDr,0)) .q:SSRowId="" .s SSStatus=$p($g(^DHCPESS(SSRowId,1)),"^",7) .If ((SSStatus="SA")||(SSStatus="GA")) s LocIsAudit=LocIsAudit+1 q:Count=0 2 //没有操作权限 i (Count>LocIsAudit) s LocIsAudit=0 i (Count=LocIsAudit)&&(LocIsAudit>0) s LocIsAudit=1 i (Count=LocIsAudit)&&(LocIsAudit=0) s LocIsAudit=1 q LocIsAudit

Method.name: GetArgValue
Method.Implementation:
s ^tmplx("GetArgValue")=String Set UserID=%session.Get("LOGON.USERID") s Date=+$H s flag=..getIsClearFlag() i flag'="" d .s Value=%request.Get(String) .//s ^zl("String",String)=Value e d .s Value=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",Date,UserID,String)) .i (String="StartDate")&&(Value'="") s Value=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(Value) .i (String="EndDate")&&(Value'="") s Value=##class(websys.Conversions).DateLogicalToHtml(Value) .i (String="IncludeCompleted")&&(Value'="") s Value=1 .i (String="IsCanSumResult")&&(Value'="") s Value=1 .i (String="LocAudited")&&(Value'="") s Value=1 .i (String="GroupName") d ..s Value=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",Date,UserID,"GroupID")) ..s Value=##Class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEGAdm).GetGAdmDesc(Value) .i (String="TeamName") ..s Value=$G(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",Date,UserID,"TeamID")) ..s Value=##Class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEGAdm).GetGTeamDesc(Value)
q Value

Method.name: getIsClearFlag
Method.Implementation: s value="" s value=value_%request.Get("PatientNo") s value=value_%request.Get("SurName") s value=value_%request.Get("StartDate") s value=value_%request.Get("EndDate") s value=value_%request.Get("IncludeCompleted") s value=value_%request.Get("IsCanSumResult") s value=value_%request.Get("GroupID") s value=value_%request.Get("TeamID") s value=value_%request.Get("LocAudited") //分科室已提交 q value

Method.name: DeleteTempQuery
Method.Implementation: s Date=+$H f s Date=$o(^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",Date),-1) q:Date="" d .k ^DHCPETempQuery("DHCPEDocPatientList",Date)

Method.name: IsChecking
KillChecking
Method.Implementation: //s EpisodeID=%request.Get("EpisodeID") q:EpisodeID="" "" k ^TempDHCPEDocPatientChecking(EpisodeID) q EpisodeID

Method.name: GetAdmInfoByReg
Method.Implementation: s PAADM="" s PAPMIRowId=$o(^PAPERi("PAPMI_PatNo",RegNo,0)) s PAADM=$O(^PAPERdr(PAPMIRowId,"ADM","H",""),-1 ) q PAADM

Method.name: GetLocRefuseFlag
Method.Implementation:
s Flag=0 i ChartID'="" d .s PEStation=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultEdit).GetPEStation($g(ChartID)) s OEORDRowId="" s OEORDID=$O(^OEORD(0,"Adm",PAADM,0)) q:OEORDID="" s ChildSub=0 f s ChildSub=$o(^OEORD(OEORDID,"I",ChildSub)) q:ChildSub="" d .s ItmMastDR=$P($g(^OEORD(OEORDID,"I",ChildSub,1)),"^",2) .q:ItmMastDR="" .s STRowId="0" .s STRowId=$O(^DHCPEST(0,"STORD_ARCIM",ItmMastDR,STRowId)) .q:(STRowId=PEStation)&&($d(^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIOrdItem","RefuseCheck",OEORDID_"||"_ChildSub))) .s Flag=1
q Flag

Method.name: DiagnosisNewExecute
Method.Implementation:
Set repid=$I(^CacheTemp) s ind=1
i BDate'="" s BDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(BDate) i EDate'="" s EDate=##class(websys.Conversions).DateHtmlToLogical(EDate)
/* 收表的global
s ^DHCPEDataEx("ConfirmRecPaper",PIADM)=..IAdmRecived(Time) s ^DHCPEDataEx("ConfirmRecPaper","Date",+$h,PIADM)="" s ^DHCPEDataEx("ConfirmRecPaper","DateTime",+$h,Time,PIADM)="" s ^DHCPEDataEx("ConfirmRecPaper","ReportDate",PIADM)=ReportDate q:ReportDate="" 0 s ^DHCPEDataEx("DHCPEPreIADM","GetReportDateTime","I",PIADM)=ReportDate_"^"_Time s ^DHCPEDataExi("DHCPEPreIADM","GetReportDateTime","I",ReportDate,Time,PIADM)="" */ i ReCheck="on" d .s ReCheck="Y" e d .s ReCheck="" k ^DHCPETMP("DiagnosisOrder") s Date=BDate-1 f s Date=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"AdmDateTime",Date)) q:(Date="")||(Date>EDate) d .s time=0 .f s time=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"AdmDateTime",Date,time)) q:(time="") d ..s IADM=0 ..f s IADM=$o(^DHCPEIADM(0,"AdmDateTime",Date,time,IADM)) q:(IADM="") d ...s PIADM=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADM),"^",4) ...s Status=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADM),"^",8) ...q:Status'="ARRIVED" ...s LocFlag=##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetLocFlag("PreADM",PIADM) ...q:LocFlag="1" ...s PBID=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PIADM),"^",1) ...s PGADM=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PIADM),"^",2) ...s G=$p(^DHCPEIADM(IADM),"^",2) ...q:(GroupID="ALLI")&&(G'="") ...q:(GroupID="ALLG")&&(G="") ...q:((GroupID'="")&&(GroupID'="ALLI")&&(GroupID'="ALLG")&&(GroupID'=G)) ...;q:(GroupID'="")&&(GroupID'=G) ...s CurGroupName="" ...i PGADM'="" d ....s GBI=$P(^DHCPEPreGADM(PGADM),"^",1) ....s CurGroupName=$P(^DHCPEPreGBI(GBI),"^",2) ...;q:(GroupName'="")&&(CurGroupName'[GroupName) ...s CurReCheck=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PIADM),"^",28) ...q:(ReCheck="Y")&&(ReCheck'=CurReCheck) ...s CurVip=+##class(web.DHCPE.PreCommon).GetVIPLevel("Pre",PIADM) ...q:(VIPLevel'="")&&(VIPLevel'=CurVip) ...s HPNo=$p(^DHCPEPreIADM(PIADM),"^",27) ...s Reg=$p(^DHCPEPreIBI(PBID),"^",1) ...s Name=$p(^DHCPEPreIBI(PBID),"^",2) ...s PAADM=##class(web.DHCPE.DHCPEIAdm).GetPAADMByPADM(PIADM)
...;q:(##class(web.DHCPE.ResultDiagnosisNew).GetStatus(PAADM)'=0) ...s GenStatus=##class(web.DHCPE.ResultDiagnosisNew).GetStatus(PAADM) ...s sta=##class(web.DHCPE.TransResult).GetStatus(PAADM) ...s O=$g(^DHCPEDataEx("TransResult",PAADM,"S")) ...s ind=ind+1 ...s:(G="") TGroup="" ...s:(G'="") TGroup="Y" ...s:GenStatus="1" O=4 ...s:GenStatus="2" O=5 ...s ^DHCPETMP("DiagnosisOrder",O,HPNo,ind)=Name_"^"_Reg_"^"_PAADM_"^"_O_"^"_HPNo_"^"_TGroup
s o=0,ind=1 f s o=$o(^DHCPETMP("DiagnosisOrder",o)) q:(o="") d .s HPNo="" .f s HPNo=$o(^DHCPETMP("DiagnosisOrder",o,HPNo)) q:(HPNo="") d ..s ind2=0 ..f s ind2=$o(^DHCPETMP("DiagnosisOrder",o,HPNo,ind2)) q:(ind2="") d ...s dd=$g(^DHCPETMP("DiagnosisOrder",o,HPNo,ind2)) ...s Data=$lb(ind,$p(dd,"^",1),$p(dd,"^",2),$p(dd,"^",3),$p(dd,"^",4),$p(dd,"^",5),$p(dd,"^",6)) ...d Autotrans11
Set qHandle=$lb(0,repid,0) Quit $$$OK Autotrans11 //set Data=$lb(Name,Reg,PAADM) Set ^CacheTemp(repid,ind)=Data Set ind=ind+1
q

Method.name: DiagnosisNewFetch
DiagnosisNewClose
Method.Implementation: Set repid=$LIST(qHandle,2) Kill ^CacheTemp(repid) Quit $$$OK
